DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY BRIEFLY
DOC.TEXT: First American Financial Corp. : The Santa Ana company on Monday selected Jerald P . Lewis as president and chief_executive_officer of its subsidiary , First American Trust Co.Thomas C . Casey , who served as president of First American Trust since 1992 , became vice_chairman . Charles A . Potter , chairman and former chief_executive_officer , will remain as chairman_of_the_board . Lewis , 56 , worked_at San Diego Trust & Savings Bank since 1959 . For the past 19 years there , he held the position of senior_vice_president and trust services group manager . First American Trust has offices in Santa Ana , Newport Beach and Laguna Hills .
